authorizeElection(address,uint256).details: Authorizes an election to use this paymaster

params._voteLimit: Maximum number of sponsored votes for this election

executeVote(address,string,bytes32,bytes.details: Executes a vote on behalf of a voter (gasless voting)

params._nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks

unauthorizeElection(address).details: Unauthorizes an election from using this paymaster

updateVoteLimit(address,uint256).details: Updates the vote limit for an election
